subject: Pedals won't update
description_text:
Hi 
I was wondering if there's anyway of updating the pedals I have the plus pro but they won't update and keeps coming up with too old but when I try to update it won't let me 

Sent from AOL on Android

conversations.body_text: Hi Rory Tuffin,    In SIMSONN Manager 2.0.9. go to the update section and click on “Manual Firmware Update.” Then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder, open the pedals subfolder, and select the plus.sfu file to update the firmware.
